# Mock SSH Command Outputs

## Directory Creation Success
Created directory: /home/cpaneluser/blog-app/backend
Created directory: /home/cpaneluser/blog-app/backend/logs
Created directory: /home/cpaneluser/blog-app/drafts

## Directory Listing
/home/cpaneluser/blog-app
/home/cpaneluser/blog-app/backend
/home/cpaneluser/blog-app/backend/logs

/home/cpaneluser/blog-app/backend/src
/home/cpaneluser/blog-app/drafts

drwxr-xr-x 2 cpaneluser cpaneluser 4096 Dec 14 12:00 backend
drwxr-xr-x 2 cpaneluser cpaneluser 4096 Dec 14 12:00 drafts

Application restarted successfully

## Service Restart Failure

Check logs at /home/cpaneluser/logs/passenger.log

## Cron Job Creation Success
Cron job created: * * * * * cd /home/cpaneluser/blog-app/backend && uv run scripts/process_notifications.py

0 3 * * 0 cd /home/cpaneluser/blog-app/backend && uv run scripts/cleanup_revisions.py

## SSH Connection Test Success
SSH connection successful to cpaneluser@192.0.2.1:22

## SSH Connection Test Failure
ssh: connect to host 192.0.2.1 port 22: Connection refused
